snippet: Demoralized by renovations and eviction attempts, residents at the Chelsea Hotel greeted the news that punk songstress Patti Smith would perform a private show there with deep skepticism.
abstract: Residents at Manhattan's Chelsea Hotel greet the news that punk songstress Patti Smith, a former tenant, would perform a private show there with deep skepticism; demoralized by renovations and eviction attempts, some wonder if the concert is a craven attempt by the building's new owner, Chetrit Group, to make peace with tenants.
lead_paragraph: Demoralized by renovations and eviction attempts, residents at the Chelsea Hotel greeted the news that punk songstress Patti Smith would perform a private show there with deep skepticism.

headline.seo: Doubts Over Patti Smith Concert Plan for Chelsea Hotel Tenants
headline.main: At Hotel of Artists, Skepticism Over a Show
headline.print_headline: At Hotel Of Artists, Skepticism Over a Show
